"Hello, <%me>.<br>I should formally intr: "My name is Asuna. I'm Kirito's adventuring partner."
"This outfit brings back a lot of memories. I was wearing it when I first got to know Kirito."

"Back then, I was known as the sub-leader of the Knights of the Blood...
I felt like if I wasn't strong enough...
Any day could have been my last."
"Kirito and I weren't nearly as close back then as we are now. Hehe, now that I think about it, I used to be very stubborn."
"There are lots of memories, both good and bad, tied up with this outfit. I'm glad to have a chance to wear it again!"
"From what I've heard, you can fish on each of the different planets, is that right? I wonder what you can catch."
"That reminds me of the time Kirito caught the King of Lakes. How nostalgic~"
"Is there anything as big as that that we could catch here?"
"There's such a rich variety of fashion and room items here! I love it!"
"There's so many cute ones that I want to buy! What is it you use here, Meseta?"
"Window shopping is fun no matter what world you're in."

"私たちが元々いた世界……
《ＡＬＯ》には
仲間たちがいるの。"

"昔からの知り合いもいて……
そうね、一言でいえば戦友かな。"

"そろそろ帰らないと
皆寂しがっちゃうし、私も寂しい。
でもね……"

"人との出会いは、いつも奇跡で
大切なもの。私にはそれを
教えてくれた人がいるから……"

"だから、今は一緒に楽しみましょう。
いつかあなた達を《ＡＬＯ》に
ご招待したいな。皆喜ぶと思うよ！"
